about.name: Aidan Shea
about.title: Computer Science Student at Boston College
about.biography:
Aidan Shea is a student at Boston College where he is working towards a B.S. in Computer Science and a minor in Philosophy.
He is especially interested in the fields of data science and data analytics. He hopes to get a job in one of these fields after
graduation. Aidan enjoys playing the violin in his free time.

first_item.title1: Enrolled in a Web Application Development course at Boston College

second_item.title2: Started senior year at Boston College

third_item.title3: Started freshman year at Boston College

first_project.title1: ASL Fingerspelling Detection and Translation using a Convolutional Neural Network - Uses Scikit-Learn, Keras, Tensor Flow, Numpy, Matplotlib
first_project.description1: This project's goal was to build a program to translate images of ASL fingerspelling into text using a CNN.

second_project.title2: Analyzing Data Distribution and Computing the Number of Distinct Elements in a Data Set Consisting of Over One Million Data Points - Uses Spark, Scala, Google Cloud Platform
second_project.description2: This project's goal was to utilize Spark and GCP in order to find out information about a data set.

third_project.title3: Treble‚Äù iOS App - Uses Google Firebase, Google Storage, Google Authentication, Google Place Autocomplete, Mapkit
third_project.description3: This project is an iOS App that allows users to create a post for an event and allows others to see events

fourth_project.title4: GDP Per Capita Predictor - Uses Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn
fourth_project.description4: This project consisted of cleaning and analyzing a dataset detailing the countries of the world and attempting to predict the GDP Per Capita of the countries based on other features in the dataset.
